Animation Items Demos

These demos show scroll-driven animations on individual items using the animate attribute.
Scroll down to see elements animate as they enter the viewport.

↓ Scroll down to see animations ↓

Bounce Animations

bounce() trigger, pace="slow"

Items bounce in sequentially. <lay-out animate="bounce() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-up() trigger, pace="slow"

Items bounce in from below. <lay-out animate="bounce-in-up() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-down() trigger, pace="slow"

Items bounce in from above. <lay-out animate="bounce-in-down() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-left() trigger, pace="slow"

Items bounce in from left. <lay-out animate="bounce-in-left() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

bounce-in-right() trigger, pace="slow"

Items bounce in from right. <lay-out animate="bounce-in-right() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

Fade Animations

fade-up() trigger

Items fade in and move up. <lay-out animate="fade-up() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up-left() trigger

Items fade in and move up-left. <lay-out animate="fade-up-left() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up-right() trigger-exit

Items fade out and move up-right. Exit only — no animation on entry. <lay-out animate="fade-up-right() trigger-exit" lg="columns(3)">

fade-down() trigger

Items fade in and move down. <lay-out animate="fade-down() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-down-left() trigger

Items fade in and move down-left. <lay-out animate="fade-down-left() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-down-right() trigger

Items fade in and move down-right. <lay-out animate="fade-down-right() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-left() trigger

Items fade in and move left. <lay-out animate="fade-left() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-right() trigger

Items fade in and move right. <lay-out animate="fade-right() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-in() trigger

Items fade in (opacity only). <lay-out animate="fade-in() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

Flip Animations

flip-up() trigger

Items flip up. <lay-out animate="flip-up() trigger" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

flip-down() trigger

Items flip down. <lay-out animate="flip-down() trigger" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

flip-left() trigger

Items flip left. <lay-out animate="flip-left() trigger" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

flip-right() trigger-exit

Items flip right. Exit only. <lay-out animate="flip-right() trigger-exit" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

flip-diagonal() trigger

Items flip diagonally. <lay-out animate="flip-diagonal() trigger" lg="columns(3)" style="transform-style: preserve-3d;">

Slide Animations

slide-up() trigger, pace="slow"

Items slide up. <lay-out animate="slide-up() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

slide-down() trigger clip, pace="slow"

Items slide down. Clipped to prevent overflow. <lay-out animate="slide-down() trigger clip" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

slide-in() trigger, pace="slow"

Items slide in (from left). <lay-out animate="slide-in() trigger" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

Zoom Animations

zoom-in() trigger

Items zoom in. <lay-out animate="zoom-in() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-in-rotate() trigger

Items zoom in and rotate. <lay-out animate="zoom-in-rotate() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-out-rotate() trigger

Items zoom out and rotate. <lay-out animate="zoom-out-rotate() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-out() trigger

Items zoom out (from large to normal). <lay-out animate="zoom-out() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

Deep Animations

fade-up() trigger deep

Animation propagates to children of items. <lay-out animate="fade-up() trigger deep" lg="columns(3)">

Animation Multipliers

Use a multiplier (1–3) to control animation intensity. Default is 1×.

fade-up — Default vs 2× vs 3×

2× intensity (220px translation). <lay-out animate="fade-up(2) trigger" lg="columns(3)">
3× intensity (330px translation). <lay-out animate="fade-up(3) trigger" lg="columns(3)">

Custom Easings

Apply custom easings to item animations with the easing attribute.

slide-in() trigger with easing="ease-elastic-1"

Items slide in with elastic overshoot. <lay-out animate="slide-in() trigger" easing="ease-elastic-1" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up() trigger with easing="ease-spring-1"

Items spring up gently. <lay-out animate="fade-up() trigger" easing="ease-spring-1" lg="columns(3)">

Trigger Direction

Control whether triggered animations play on entry, exit, or both. Uses trigger (entry), trigger-exit (exit only), or trigger-both (entry + exit).

fade-up() trigger

Items fade up on entry — stay visible on exit. <lay-out animate="fade-up() trigger" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up() trigger-exit

Items animate only when scrolling out of view. <lay-out animate="fade-up() trigger-exit" lg="columns(3)">

fade-up() trigger-both

Items fade up on entry, reverse on exit. <lay-out animate="fade-up() trigger-both" lg="columns(3)">

zoom-in() trigger-both

Items zoom in on entry, reverse on exit. <lay-out animate="zoom-in() trigger-both" lg="columns(3)">

flip-up() trigger-exit

Items flip only when scrolling out of view. <lay-out animate="flip-up() trigger-exit" lg="columns(3)">
